Olga Karlatos |children = 2 |website = |imdb = [https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0710230/ Profile] }} '''Arthur Rankin Davenport, Jr.''' ([[19 July]] [[1924]] - [[30 January]] [[2014]]) was one of the founders of [[Rankin/Bass|"Videocraft International"]] in the early 1960's. Together with [[Jules Bass]], he directed and produced [[The Hobbit (1977 film)]] and [[The Return of the King (1980 film)]]. ==Awards== * [[1977]] - ''[[wikipedia:Peabody Award|Peabody Award]]'', Best Movie, [[The Hobbit (1977 film)|''The Hobbit'' (1977 film)]] ==External links== * {{WP|Arthur Rankin, Jr.}} * [http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0710230/ Arthur Rankin, Jr.] at IMDb [[Category:Directors|Rankin, Arthur]] [[Category:American people|Rankin, Arthur]] [[Category:People by name|Rankin, Arthur]]
